Introduction

Geenius is a five-member girl group under HOMe Entertainment a sub-label between Sure Place Entertainment and BlockBerry Creative. They made their debut on January 5, 2024 with the digital single "Voyage".

Pre-debut it was revealed that Geenius was previously known as Bebez, Blockberry_bebez, and GGolmulz while training as a group at BlockBerry Creative in 2018, but all the members left the agency after their exclusive contracts expired and thus signed new contracts with Sure Place Entertainment. However, just a few days prior to their debut, it was revealed that their actual agency is HOMe Entertainment.
